text:
Nick Jonas got the cutest surprise ever during the American Music Awards red carpet!

While being interviewed, the “Find You” singer was asked a hard hitting question by the sweetest interviewer ever, his niece!

Kevin Jonas sent over the video of his daughter, Alena, and she totally crushed her first interview! Check out Alena ask her uncle who he’s seeing lately!

My brother @kevinjonas and my sister in law @daniellejonas planned this all and then took this video of the live TV feed… this may be my favorite red carpet moment ever. I love my sweet sweet niece Alena! The #amas were one to be remembered this year for so many reasons. pic.twitter.com/oZFDwNmVS7 — Nick Jonas (@nickjonas) November 20, 2017

Ugh! Not even Alena could get Nick to tell us who he’s been dating. Back to the guessing game!

Check out the best looks from last night’s AMAs red carpet!
title: Nick Jonas Gets An Adorable Surprise At The AMAs

meta_data.description: Someone stole Nick's heart last night!
